desc:
Afrigis change to SaaS Integration point.

In two weeks from now we intend moving the saas.afrigis.co.za endpoint onto a different platform. As such the IP address related to this service will change. 

The only change that is required on your side is to open ports 80 and/or 443 to the new IP address - 197.96.29.138 before Friday 1 May. Please do not close the connection to the current IP address of 196.36.89.150 as this will still be utilised in the future.

Once we have completed full integration testing on the new platform we will update the DNS for saas.afrigis.co.za to the new endpoint and your services will automatically start utilising the updated services. We will however send out another note before we complete the change with an exact date and time of the scheduled change.

Please note that there are no functionality changes required.
name: SW - Afrigis IP Address Addition
